    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y)
        Adjusts the rotation of the robot and it's heading to travel to designated coordinate point
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate in coordinate grid robot needs to travel to
        y - y coordinate in coordinate grid robot needs to travel to

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta,
                   boolean block)
        Designed to rotate the robot a preset number of degrees
        Parameters:
        theta - The angle at which the robot needs to turn too
        block - Whether or not the execution of the turn should block threads

      • pointTo

        public void pointTo(double theta)
        Designed to rotate robot to face a direction defined by theta
        Parameters:
        theta - The final orientation desired

      • stopMotors

        public void stopMotors()
        Used to stop both left and right motors in sync with each other

      • driveDistance

        public void driveDistance(int distance,
                          boolean forward)
        Allows the robot to drive a fixed number of cm either in reverse or forwards
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance in cm that the robot will drive
        forward - whether the robot will be going backwards or forwards

      • synchronizeMotors

        public void synchronizeMotors()
        Used to synchronize leftMotor and rightMotor together

      • startSynchronization

        public void startSynchronization()
        Must be called before a set of synchronized subroutines

      • endSynchronization

        public void endSynchronization()
        Called to end synchronization of motors and to signal an end of a synchronized subroutine

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int leftM,
                     int rightM)
        Used to set the motor speed and get the motor to travel in a constant direction, if values are negative the robot will travel backwards
        Parameters:
        leftM - speed of the left motor
        rightM - speed of the right motor

      • driveZiplineDistance

        public void driveZiplineDistance(double distance)
        Drives the zipline motor a predefined distance
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance which the zipline motor needs to drive

      • driveLength

        public void driveLength(double distance)
        Drives left and right motor a certain distance in cm as defined by distance
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance in cm the left and right motor should move by

      • driveZipline

        public void driveZipline()
        A set of instructions that all the robot to traverse the zipline from the point Xo, Yo

      • isNavigating

        public boolean isNavigating()
        Indicates whether the robot is in the process of navigation
        Returns:
        If the robot's left or right motor is moving it returns true
